name: Peaceful Soul
description:
Peaceful Soul is a Social Life Simulation game. It's about an arrogant young man who 'exiled' by his parents. His parents don't like his attitude thereof they decide to send their son to a village. The village they were met with each other and lived before. And now, life in the village begins for the young man.

This game set in Radish Village, where you can build friendships with villagers, take part in many engaging festivals, take a job as a full time or part-time job, spend the rest of the days to find fish that you haven't caught before or just spend hours in the mine to find ores to get additional money.

Bachelorettes


There are six Bachelorettes that can be married. They are Rika, Aulya, Dwii, Intan, Sasha, and Hosi.

Rival


To get married to one of the Bachelorettes, Main Character has to compete against one of the rivals. The rivals you have to compete with are Zen, Bangun, Noor, Eric, Yossy, and Lucky.

Current Features

  • Minigames
  • Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter Festivals
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • Mine with Puzzles
  • Stamina, Health, and Immunity System
  • Jobs System (part-time or full-time, currently two kinds of jobs)
  • Bank System (Saving and Loan)
  • Dynamic Weather

Upcoming Features

  • House customization System.
  • Heart Events.
  • More Minigames.
  • More Mine Floors + Puzzles.
  • Marriage
  • Village Secrets
